fan out.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if a group of people fan out, they walk forwards while spreading over a wide area
fan out.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to spread out a group of things that you are holding so that they make a half-circle
fan out.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Fan the cards out, then pick one.
fan out.translation[0].definitions[2].de: if something such as hair or clothing fans out, it spreads out in many directions
